132.content:
It was a cloudy overcast day in the Adachi ward of Tokyo. The time of year was fall, and winter would be coming. Thankfully one that doesn't last for ten years, more like ten weeks.

And on the sidewalk on her way to school was a rather tall girl dressed in a red school uniform, taller than most Japanese at around 5'8. Given her age, she still has room to grow. She is quite beautiful, as her hair was long and obsidian, her eyes a dark grey, and carried with her a rather feminen physique.

And she was tending her right index finger, sucking on it in response to it being bitten by a cat.

"Why does that cat bite?" Whispered Sakaki to herself. She knew she would have to visit the nurses when she gets to school. She heard that cat's mouths were chock full of bacteria and she could get infected. It would mean skipping one day, but it would only be one day, and she can ask her friend Yomi for any notes.

But knowing Yomi, she'd be more interested in the more recent diet fad than notes. The tall girl sighed.

"I'll have to ask Kagura then..." At least Kagura would be more than happy to give Sakaki her notes.

As she rounded the corner she...
132.title: Another Dull Day

choices: "We can meet at my school's entrance"
"We can meet at your Dad's bakery"
Something else?
1321.content:
Sakaki proceeded around the street's corner, only to be met with a crash into something quite hard. Causing her to tumble onto the floor, Sakaki landed on her back and soon felt something soft fall onto her face as well.

"Oh goodness! I'm terribly sorry, I didn't see you there!" A voice unfamiliar to Sakaki was heard by her, a voice which she was unable to distinguish from male or female just from hearing it.

Putting her hands onto her face, she felt them sink into the soft object that had fallen square onto her face, blocking her vision. It would seem the object wasn't completely stable, crumbing as her slender hands pressed into it. Her prodding had caused some of the object to go into her mouth, which flew onto her tastebuds and greeted them with a strong pang of lemon.

Eventually grabbing the object and pulling it off her face, Sakaki could see that the culprit that blocked her vision was a small lemon cheesecake. Splatters and dashes of lemon sauce were still present on her face, urging Sakaki to lick as much off her face as she could. She greatly enjoyed the vast flavours of the cheesecake entering her mouth.

Moving her eyes upwards, she also laid eyes on the figure that currently stood over her, reaching an extended hand outwards to her, along with a worried expression plastered onto the person's face.

The figure before her had light brown hair, which was cut just above the shoulders Despite the worried face, the person had a pair of bright gleaming green eyes that shone as the sunlight reflected off them. The figure wore a white, short sleeved shirt that sported a few thin, black strips around the cuffs and vertically across the whole shirt. There was also a small blue tie which wrapped around the collar of the shirt well. A belt was fastened onto some long, blue trousers which fit perfectly on the person's legs. Their figure was tall and slim, with the trousers and shirt confirming the slender physique of the person. Sakaki was snapped back into her sense by the voice of the person in front of her.

"Here, take my hand. That was quite the fall you had." The hand of the figure was still reaching outwards so that Sakaki could be able to hold onto it. She reached and grasped onto the hand that was offered to her, and with a heave she was back up on her feet thanks to the stranger.

"Are you okay? You're not hurt, are you?" The person asked Sakaki.

"Yes, I'm fine. Thanks for helping me back up." Sakaki replied.

"Phew, that's a relief! Too bad I can't say my cake is alright!" The person scratched the back of his head, chuckling a little.

Sakaki soon noticed that she still held the ruined cheesecake in her left hand, which was thankfully not the one she used to grab onto her helper's hand. "Sorry about your cake" She said, a pang of guilt in her voice.

"Don't sweat it, I can just get a another one easily. My dad won't be too happy though. You see, he owns a bakery just a few blocks away and I'm free to take some of the stock if he allows it. He's teaching me how to cook as well, I'm already getting the hang of it." The stranger explained.

"Oh, okay then. Still, I'm quite sorry....." Sakaki trailed off, realising that she didn't know the person's name.

"Snap, I forgot to introduce myself! I'm Kei, Kei Yuta. I'd shake hands, but we've already done that, haven't we?" Kei chuckled some more.

"I'm Sakaki, it's a pleasure to meet you." A warm smile crossed her face, still covered in lemon sauce.

"Oh, here. Clean your face with this." Kei reached into his pocket and took a large handkerchief out, passing it to Sakaki.

"Thank you" She replied, wiping her face clean. "I must say, your dad is a great cook. This cake is delicious."

"Yeah, he knows how to make some pretty sweet treats! You can have that if you want, just wrap it into your handkerchief!" Kei said in return.

"Oh, thanks Kei." She wrapped the cheesecake into her used handkerchief. "I still feel guilty about the cake. I must make it up to you,"

"There's really no need, but you want to, go ahead." Kei said.

"Are you free after school? We can meet up and I'll buy you something in return." Sakaki suggested.

"That sounds good to me! Where do you want to meet at?" Kei asked.

"Well......"






Kei Yuta
1321.title: Bumped into someone. Who is this person?

choices: Tomo
Kagura
13212.content:
"Well....you don't go to my school." Sakaki said, looking at Kei's school uniform, which was vastly different to her uniform. "So, I guess I'll just meet up with you at your Dad's bakery. Are you good with that?"

Kei smiled and replied "I don't see any problems with that. I might be a little busy, having to feed my cats, but I'm sur-"

"Cats!?!" Sakaki's voice rose up, instantly jerking forwards as she heard the single word "Cat"

"Yeah, I have two pet cats at home. My Dad isn't too good with animals, so he leaves them up to me. I take it you like cats?" Kei replied and smiled at Sakaki's reaction.

"Heh heh, yeah....." Sakaki blushed, feeling a little embarrassed after her outburst. "They are my favourite animal."

"After we've met up, I'll let you have some time with them before we do whatever you have planned, okay?" Kei suggested.

"Oh yes, that would be wonderful!" While she didn't show it, in her mind Sakaki was jumping for joy.

"Okay then, see you after school Sakaki!" Kei said, heading in the opposite direction to her.

"See you then!" Sakaki waved to him as he soon disappeared around the corner. With a new found spring in her step, she happily made her way down to school.

At the school.......

Sakaki soon arrived at her homeroom class, opening the door and making her way down to her seat. Yukari, her teacher, was late as always, Osaka was idly sleeping at her desk, Chiyo was scribbling some notes down, while Kagura, Tomo, and Yomi were in a small group, chatting amongst themselves. From the looks of them, they were having a rather heated debate.

".......and THAT'S why I'd make a better athlete! Nothing you can say will make it false!" Tomo shouted in her usual tone, her hands on her hips and her stance in a triumphant manner.

"There's no way! I'm the only one who can even come close to beating Sakaki in a race!" Kagura replied, her face locked in an angry expression, her eyes shooting daggers at Tomo.

"Actually, here comes Sakaki now. Can you ask her about this instead of bothering me?" Yomi said, her voice dull and exhausted.

Practically running into her, Tomo blared into her face "Hey, Sakaki! Isn't it true that there's no way Kagura is better than me at sports?

Still gleaming at her proposed time with Kei and the chance to pet some cats, Sakaki merely walked past Tomo and sat down onto her seat, looking at the window in excitement for her after school plans.

Tomo, Kagura and Yomi all looked in shock at Sakaki. "T-t-t-there's no way someone could ignore Tomo like that!" Yomi said, a slight tremble in her voice.

Tomo raised her voice yet again. "YEAH! No one ignores Tomo Takino! HEY! Sakaki! SAKAKI!" Despite her shouts, Sakaki continued her blissful thinking.

"Hmmm....come to think of it, she did come in later than usual." Kagura said, thinking hard. "Maybe that has something to do with her strange mood."

"Hmmmm....." The trio said simultaneously. That was until a certain loudmouth opened her maw again.

"AH HA! I've got it!" Tomo yelled, causing Osaka to wake up.

"Huh....you've got what? I hope it's a present, I love presents......" Osaka mumbled before falling back into her slumber.

"What are you thinking Tomo, It better not be dumb...." Yomi responded, doubt in her voice.

"Isn't it obvious? Sakaki has a boyfriend!" Tomo declared, her hand raised in victory.

"What? No way, that's an obvious lie!" Yomi said.

"Hey, she has a good point!" Kagura interjected.

"Oh please! Where's the evidence?" Yomi asked, her hands folded.

"Well, we haven't got any now, but we'll get some!" Tomo replied. "We'll follow her and get some photographic evidence!" She held up her mobile phone in the air like it was a rare treasure.

"Should I go as well? Just in case one of us gets spotted or something." Kagura suggested.

"Huh....good point!" Tomo said. "We'll have to think about that....."

Later, at the end of school......

As soon as the school day had ended, Sakaki wasted no time racing out of the gates to make her way to the Bakery Kei's Dad owned. Unbeknownst to her, she was being followed by.......
13212.title: "We can meet at your Dad's bakery"

choices: We follow Kei and Sakaki as he getsher an after school snack.
We go back to Tomo outside the store/house, texting to her friends.
132121.content:
Tomo poked her head outside the school gate and saw Sakaki trotting down the sidewalk.

“Wow, never seen her this enthusiastic since…” She scratched her head to find a time and place. “Never!” She chuckled with a large grin. “This I GOT to see…” And she ran on after, making sure there’s enough distance between her and Sakaki to make sure the former wouldn’t notice.

-Half hour later-

Tomo was slowing down, panting as she ran. She stopped on the sidewalk and placed her hands on her knees.

“Christ…how far…is this…guy!” She panted. “I’m gonna…” She stood up, wiping her brow. “Beat this guy’s face in!” And up ahead she still saw Sakaki trotting as if she wasn’t tired at all.

“Ah give me a break!” Tomo groaned and slowly followed along after her.

As Sakaki rounded the corner Tomo finally decided to walk. “Screw this…” She groaned as she rounded the corner.

And saw Sakaki talking to…a girl in light brown hair wearing an apron. Tomo rounded back on the corner, her face full of shock.

“What the- Sakaki went to all this trouble for a girl!” She poked her head out, her eyes keen. “What could it mean…”

-X-

“I’m glad you came Sakaki,” smiled Kei as he looked up at the taller girl, who was slightly panting a little.

“Don’t mention it…I came all the way from school to see you,” she said lightly.

“Wow, so you ran that fast? Come in,” Kei opened the door for her. “You must be thirsty and hungry yes?” Sakaki gave him a grin and nodded.

“Yes, I am feeling a bit peckish at the moment, and I can’t wait to see your cats!” Kei blushed a little as he followed Sakaki inside the bakery. “This is where I work…and my dad and I live upstairs.” He pointed to a door at the far end of the wall, which could lead up to stairs and the house above the said bakery.

“Pardon me for asking but do you have a mom?” Asked Sakaki lightly. Kei shrugged.

“My parents divorced several years ago. Mom’s out living in Kyushu.” The tall girl’s shoulder’s slumped.

“Oh…I’m sorry…”

“Don’t worry about it. You must want to meet Roo and Ki right?”

“Your cats?” She asked. Kei nodded.

“Mm-hmm! Right this way,” He walked past the bakery and went through the door and up the stairs, Sakaki following close behind. As she finished the climb, she was greeted by an ash grey tabby and a slightly smaller black Bengal cat. The black Bengal gave a verbal meow. Sakaki couldn’t help but gush over the cuteness of the felines, and replied back with a “Nyaaa~…” Of her own. Kei noticed.

“You seem to like them.” He went over to the kitchen and grabbed two cups out of cupboard. Sakaki was down on her knees, her rear end up high.

“Hi there…” She reached a hand out and the purring black cat rubbed her head against her hand, and Sakaki petted it. The tall girl never felt happier in her life. The ash grey tabby just sat their on it’s haunches and stared, before joining the black one and licking Sakaki’s hand.

She couldn’t help but give a chuckle. “So rough,” she whispered, and out of compulsion of the cuteness, began to wiggle her behind up side to side.

As Kei finished pouring the glasses he turned and stopped, blushing at the scene. He could clearly see Sakaki’s long powerful yet feminine legs, traveling up to her skirt…

And he can see white panties with a tiny kitten face on the bottom. He looked away.

“Ah um..Sakaki…I have some water,” Sakaki stopped her petting and stood up, walking towards the shorter boy and grabbing a cup for her own.

“Thank you…this means a lot to me Kei…” She smiled. Kei’s face still had a light shade of pink.

“N-no problem. What do you mean?”

“I mean, I have a weakness for cute things Kei…and your cats and you are-“ She stopped herself and now HER face was pink as she looked away. Kei caught that and felt awkward.

“Umm…I think I’m starting to get hungry…” Blushed Sakaki, hoping to change the subject. “Do you have any food I can have for a snack…”

“Y-Yeah…” Kei replied nervously. “Of course…”
132121.title: Tomo

choices: We follow Sakaki continuing to chow down on Kei's baked goods
Afterwards, Sakaki exits from the bakery with a stuffed tummy, and Tomo is there
1321211.content:
"I got some cake if you want some," mentioned Kei as he brought over a slice of yellow cake with chocolate frosting. Sakaki was watching TV on the couch, Roo and Ki to her sides and being petted on. The tall girl looked up at the feminine boy and smiled.

"Yes I'd love some," Replied Sakaki. Kei shooed away the two cakes, and ran off after each other in a playful spirit. Sakaki chuckled lightly and began to dig into the cake as the two watched some wacky game show.

"I'll never understand why people go through on those things," commented the tall girl. Kei looked up.

"You mean on these game shows?" At about that time, some middle aged man got wacked upside the rear with a fly swatter, the crowd erupting in "oooh!" and laughter at his expression.

"Yes. Why hurt yourself like that..."

"Maybe their masochists? And there's also the money you could win." Sakaki shrugged.

“It’s so…” The same guy got slapped again, only this time in the crotch. “Un-cute…”

At that moment, she shuffled closer to Kei, who was oblivious towards this as he changed the channel to an animal channel.

“So, why do you like cats?” Asked Kei. Sakaki looked down at the feminine boy.

“Well…cats are cute…” She whispered softly. The boy nodded and shrugged.

“Fair enough. I can get that.” He leaned back, finishing his slice. Sakaki finished her slice.

“The cake was umm…good.”

“I’m glad. I baked that myself. Want some more?” He asked. Sakaki nodded.

“Sure.”

-Outside-

Tomo’s finger’s flew on her cellphone, mainly that she was telling Kagura about Sakaki.

Tomo: And then Sakaki went upstairs with this one girl in some house! I aint tripping

Kagura: did you say girl? U srs?

Tomo: Does it sound like I am? And use grammar!

Kagura: how about no. ill tell yomi about this. You talk to her when she leaves?

Tomo: Maybe. I just can’t believe that Sakaki is into…girls…

There was no reply from Kagura from there on.

Tomo: Kags?

No reply.

The girl sighed. “Man. Never knew she was into the moe-DFC type…then wouldn’t she try hitting on Osaka or something?”

Then she chuckled at her own logic. “Pfft, Osaka getting ass of any gender. Hell will freeze over before THAT happens,” she chortled. She looked up and down the street, her hand on her slim stomach.

“Man, all that running made me build up an appetite. I’m starving!” She noticed a nearby burger spot. She checked her purse, seeing some bills.

“Well, nothing wrong with a burger from their value menu. Besides, it’s not like I’ll go there everyday and get fat!” That being said, the dark haired girl walked off.
1321211.title: We follow Kei and Sakaki as he getsher an after...

choices: Go to the school next morning?
Go to the bakery next afternoon?
13212111.content:
As a pair of lion cubs rolled around on the floor near their resting father on TV, Sakaki was enjoying another slice of fresh homemade cake, this cake being a full on chocolate cake slice, with the filling, icing and insides all chocolate. The dessert treat enriched her taste buds, thanking Kei in silence for their bountiful meal.

Kei had returned from the kitchen with another plate of cake in his hands. "Someone's enjoying herself." he said, smiling as another forkful entered Sakaki's mouth.

Waiting until she had swallowed, Sakaki replied "Yes, it is very nice."

"Yeah, Chocolate is always a big hit. The only way we can improve on it is if we add more chocolate!" Kei said, sitting back down on the couch as he did.

The final morsel of cake entered Sakaki's stomach, who had now finished her second slice of cake. "That was delicious Kei. You're too kind."

"Oh, hang on Sakaki. You've got a bit of icing on your cheek." Kei told her, fetching another handkerchief out of his pocket. Instead of this morning, where he simply gave it to Sakaki, he went up to her and wiped the icing off himself.

Kei had never been up this close to her before. Despite his handkerchief in the way, he could still see Sakaki's radiant face. Her soft cheeks were slightly red as he carefully wiped the remnants of the cake off her cute face. "Is she embarrassed because of me?" Kei thought to himself, worried about the possibility. Quickly, he moved away from her face, discarding the handkerchief into a nearby bin.

"Hey.....your cheeks look a little flushed....." Kei pointed out, stammering slightly as he spoke.

Glancing at a mirror in the distance, Sakaki replied "Yes, it is rather hot in here."

Kei mentally breathed a sigh of relief, glad that Sakaki did not feel embarrassed. "Don't worry, you enjoy that slice of cake and I'll get you a glass of milk." Kei offered, before disappearing back into the kitchen.

Sakaki looked down at the lone slice of cake, this time a vibrant looking slice, with colourful icing on the top and a jam filling inside. "Did he make all these for me?" she thought, a slight smile entering her face at the idea.

Kei returned with a tall beaker of milk in his hand. "Here you are, this should cool you down" Kei said as he passed the milk to Sakaki.

Drinking slowly, Sakaki replied "Thank you Kei." She then went and had her first forkful of the bright slice of cake.

Kei simply sat and watched as the girl ate her cake and drank her milk. After a while, four plates had piled up with four forks (Three belonging to Sakaki and one belonging to Kei), along with an empty beaker. Sakaki sat back and relaxed on the couch, her stomach filled to the brim with cake and milk, causing her school uniform to press against the slightly expanded belly.

"All finished?" Kei asked, taking the plates and the glass from the couch.

"Oh yes, that was delicious." Sakaki answered, patting her stomach for emphasis.

"Glad to hear! I'm still relatively new to baking, so it's good to have an opinion on my work." Kei replied.

As Sakaki got up from the couch and began to gather her belongings, Kei spoke up with a question. "So, Sakaki....I was wondering....I have some other cakes I'm currently making, so maybe you'd....want to come back here tomorrow to try those out too?"

"That would be wonderful Kei. I'll make sure I'm there." Sakaki answered, a small smile on her face.

"Okay, I'll see you then? Bye!" Kei waved to her as Sakaki exited the bakery.

Just across the street, Tomo also left a building, the burger joint she had stopped over at.

"So a new burger every day this week? Limited time only? Count me in!" She yelled at the cashier as she left. Tomo had just eaten a hearty meal, her stomach also pressing against her uniform, along with a strip of her belly poking out from under her shirt.

Wiping some ketchup from her mouth, she happily skipped down the road, still ecstatic from the revelations she had found out today.
13212111.title: Follow Sakaki continuing to chow on Kei's goods

choices: Tomo, Yomi and Kagura all follow Sakaki after school.
Yomi and Kagura don't go, so Tomo goes alone.
132121111.content:
The next day, Sakaki was into her homeroom class bright and early as per usual. She was still in a happy mood, being able to stroke some cats as well as having a cute boy server you cake would put a girl like Sakaki into such a mood.

Her appearance had seen a slight tweak after yesterday, but for the most part, it was unremarkable. Her breasts had grown a little fuller, filling her uniform slightly. Her stomach had gone from being totally flat to having a slight pudge, but nothing too noticeable unless you saw her without a shirt on. Sakaki's hips had widened a little, taking form to accompany her slightly larger behind. Regardless of these changes, Sakaki's mood was still a happy one as she sat onto her desk.

Tomo, Yomi and Kagura were in heated debate as they entered the class, trying hard to keep their voices down so Sakaki wouldn't hear.

Just like Sakaki, Tomo had also been hit with a change of appearance, thanks to the sizeable meal she had eaten at the burger joint. Unlike Sakaki, who had changed more evenly, Tomo was almost completely hit in the stomach area by the distribution of her added poundage. Her stomach was pushed against her uniform, a very visible gain against the shirt. The waistband on her skirt was being stretched further than it usually was, the curve of her belly being the main cause. Her breasts had gotten the tiniest bit larger, but to a highly minimal degree.

"I know what I saw Yomi! Sakaki and a girl with my own two eyes!" Tomo argued, her voice surprisingly quite for her usual volume.

"I'm still not sold, I know you can be a pretty big liar when you want to be." Yomi replied, doubt lingering in her voice.

"Yeah, I'm with Yomi. I just don't see Sakaki as.....you know, that way." Kagura added.

Tomo put her hands on her hips and declared "Well, if both of you are too stubborn to listen to my cold hard facts....."

"Cold hard facts?" Yomi asked in a deadpan tone.

"Let me finish!" Tomo barked, throwing her arm in front of Yomi. "If you won't listen, then come along with me after school and see for yourself!"

Smacking Tomo's hand out of the way, Yomi replied "I'll think about it...."

"Yeah, I'll give it some thought too." Kagura said.

"Well, see you guys later!" Tomo turned around and walked over to her seat, creaking slightly more as sat onto it.

Leaning over to Yomi, Kagura whispered "Hey....is it just me, or has Tomo put on a few pounds?"
132121111.title: Go to the school next morning?

choices: I'll try out two to start off...
I can taste all of them. Five is fine.
1321211111.content:
As Sakaki walked out of the school gates and calmly down the sidewalk, three heads poked out from behind the gate. Tomo on bottom, Kagura inbetween, and Yomi on top.

"Okay there she goes...just act casual and we can follow her just fine..." Whispered Tomo.

"She can't hear us from this distance you know," replied Yomi in a casual deadpan.

"You don't know that!" Snipped Tomo. She saw Sakaki round a corner. "Okay! Go!" And the girl with the modest soft tummy stepped out of the gates and power walked, the two girls behind her.

"If Tomo is lying I'm going to bust her face in," groused Kagura.

"Then again, she wouldn't put this much effort into a lie, would she?" Replied the glasses wearing girl. Her companion simply nodded.

"Yes, yes she would..." Yomi sighed.

"Let's just get this over with...she would still keep 'convincing' us if we didn't come along." And the two girls followed Tomo, acting as if she were in a Tom Clancy novel.

"You know..." Yomi whispered into Kagura's ear. "I think you may have a point..."

"About...?"

"Tomo putting on a few."

"Oh," Kagura inspected the girl up ahead, her stomach having an obvious curve and her legs a bit softer. "Yeah, she has."

-X-

Sakaki walked inside the bakery, seeing Kei hard at work behind the counter. The boy looked up and smiled. "Hey Sakaki."

"Hey Kei. Are the cakes...?"

"Almost finished? Yup! I've made about...five of these puppies. How many do you want?"

Sakaki would have usually responded with 'Just a few slices would be fine' but remembering the taste from yesterday as well as the aroma she's sniffing. She know's she going to have one and she replies...

Kei smiled. "Alright then." He then turned towards his large oven and went to work, Sakaki sitting in the kitchen patiently.

"Where's your father?"

"Out on a delivery."

"Oh, Okay." Kei started to take two cakes out of the oven and he placed them on the counter, adding succulent white frosting.

Completely forgetting about the practice of eating slowly from before, Osaka was in pure bliss at the moment.

As the girls both continued to eat their cakes, they were interrupted by loud rocking noises.

"Come to think of it......" Kagura stared at the empty cake boxes, as well as her round belly "What are we going to do about this?"

Osaka wasn't listening, cramming the renaments of a chocolate cake in her mouth. After swallowing, she turned around. "What did you say Kagura?"

Kagura simply turned away from Osaka and rest her head on the counter "Never mind....."

“Yes? Yuta’s Yummie’s Bakery?”

And so came the orders, Kagura tapping on the computer screen tallying the up orders. As Osaka somehow managed to recover from her slight food coma, she stood up and stretched as Kagura was checking in order after order.

‘Good lord, how did those two get this much exposure!’ Thought the girl to herself. She couldn’t really think of anything else, as she was busy picking up call after call.

‘Crud I’m getting overwhelmed here!’ She thought, her hands flying frantically, and a receipt that’s growing longer and longer and

“Oh my!” Said a voice. And Kei came trotting to the register and picking up the other phone and putting in orders. He leaned over and patted Kagura on the back, who sighed happily.

‘Thank goodness,’ she thought. She saw Sakaki enter as well, wearing an apron. She saw Osaka in a booth and whispered into her eye. Kagura couldn’t hear what but Osaka perked up and nodded with a smile, standing up, hand on food baby of a belly, and heading towards the back. She returned a moment later with a wet towel and began to wipe down the counter and some tables. She also notice Kei mouthing off orders to Sakaki to clean up Osaka’s mess from earlier, as the day dreaming girl began to wipe down the windows and more tables. And Kagura smiled.

‘Maybe this position won’t suck after all…’ Kei then ran upstairs, Sakaki close behind him.

And shortly after, Kei brought down a few boxes of baked goods, whether it be a cake or cookies or even brownies.

“These are deliveries right?” Asked Kei. Kagura nodded, tapping in another order.

“Yeah. Only a small amount for today though. A Ton are during the course of the week,” remarked Kagura, finishing up her order and putting down the phone after thanking the customer and sighing.

“That was tough.” Kei patted her on the back.

“You did great though Kagura, better than I thought.” He smiled. And Kagura couldn’t help but smile back, feeling warm around the feminine boy.

‘Wow…Sakaki sure is lucky…’ She thought. Kei turned towards Sakaki.

“You think you can handle the orders?” Asked Kei. The tall girl nodded.

“If I need help I’ll let you know. You taught me a lot,” She smiled and Kei returned it back as Sakaki walked up the stairs, his eyes planted on her sashaying rear.

‘so lucky…’ Thought Kagura.

The house was fairly large, having a gate and fancy hedges across the walls. The garden was full of pretty flowers and ponds, giving the house a very pleasant air to it. Propping their bikes up, Tomo and Yomi walked onto the path and went to the door. The girls knocked onto the wooden door, awaiting a response. No answer. Another few knocks, but still no answer.

After standing outside the door for 5 minutes, Tomo shrugged. "Huh, guess there's no one inside! What should we do with their delivery?"

"Hmmm.....it doesn't fit into the mailslot." Yomi said, comparing the box to the slot. "We might be able to leave it out on the step."

"Hey! Leave some for me!" Tomo shouted, trying to snatch the box back as Yomi ravenously ate the cake inside.

While his son and his friends were enjoying their time at the beach basking in the sunshine, Wataru, the father of Kei and owner of the Yuta Yummies bakery was eagerly awaiting his latest date he had organised thanks to the wonders of online dating. Wataru had long been without a wife, and despite her unfortunate departure the middle aged man decided it was time to move on and find himself another woman he could know in a special way. His date had insisted she drove over to meet him, which Wataru had no problem with. He stood outside his shop, twiddling his thumbs and checking his phone every now and then in anticipation. After a while, he heard a loud screeching noise coming from up the road.

An old battered car came careening down the road, smoke billowing from the behind as the exhaust spluttered and the engine groaned. The speed it went at was near unbelivable for a car of it's age, but somehow the driver was able to send their vehicle at that speed and even be able to control it. As it passed the bakery Wataru was blanketed in thick smog from the car's exhuast, causing him to cough violently. Eventually the car made a full 180 degree turn as it soon went at top speed and then back to nought as the driver slammed the breaks down. The car tumbled to a halt, a hissing sound emitting from the engine. Shortly after a figure appeared from the car, that being Wataru's date.

With her long brown hair, comfortable patterned jumper and a long colourful dress, the woman could be identified as Yukari Tanizaki, the homeroom teacher of the many girls that Kei had grown to know. She beamed and waved over to Wataru, who had just finished clearing the smoke from his lungs. Slamming the car door and locking it up, she walked over to him and introduced herself.

"Good to see you! As you already know, my name is Yukari!" She giggled a little. "Oh, you're taller than you looked in your pictures!"

"Yeah, they're slightly older ones actually, wasn't always this tall y'know." Wataru used his older profile pictures since they showed less of his ageing hair, which had begun losing it's colour. Luckily for him, Yukari didn't seem to mind.

"Quite the driver you are Yukari....." Wataru glanced over to her car, which was still hissing rather loudly which worried him.

"Ah, the old girl's always been reliable. Takes a licking and keeps on ticking, eh?" She smiled once again, which did well to soften the slight awkward feelings Wataru had. "You've got quite the bakery here, some friends of mine have been here before, they've told me. Shall we go in?"

"Oh yes, sure thing." With Yukari in his stride Wataru opened the door and entered his bakery.

"So Nyamo, did I tell you I've put myself back onto the market?" Yukari took a sip of her coffee, smiling as she talked. She referred to Minamo as her nickname which had generally been adopted around school.

"You're dating again? That's pretty brave of you. I'd never be able to go through something like that." Nyamo drank from her own coffee, significantly weaker than Yukari's.

"Hey, with an attiude like that of course you won't go anywhere!" Yukari gave out a chuckle. "I'm telling you, dating is super easy nowadays! You just need to get yourself on some dating site, wait for the messages to pour in and see which response is right for you."

"Did that kind of method work for you?" Nyamo asked.

"Oh sure, I've already got myself a guy hook line and sinker! Just met him earlier and damn have I got myself a winner!"

"You're that confident? Are you sure about a guy you've only met once so far?" Nyamo raised an eyebrow.

"Trust me, this guy is fantastic. Wataru Yuta he's called, runs a bakery shop a few streets down from the school."

"Oh yeah....I've been there before! Is it that older guy with the slightly grey hair?"

Yukari nodded enthusiasticly. "That's the one. He's the best, I went over to his and he let me have so much stuff on the house! He is one hell of a baker, I can tell you that!"

"So your judgement on him is all based on his cooking?" Nyamo had a strange look on her face, "I'm not sure that's the best way to judge a person...."

"Well then, if you're so doubtful Miss I Don't Want To Date, why don't YOU come around with me next time I see him then, huh?" Yukari folded her arms defiantly.

Nyamo thought about this. "You know what? I think I will. I'll see if this Wataru is really all you make him out to be."

"You sure will, trust me." Yukari smirked.

The day before, late at night, the teenagers were lounging together, all of the females save for Chiyo stuffed to the brim.

"Ahhhhh....so fuullll~" Cooed Yomi as she laid down on the sand, hands on her giant over stuffed gut.

Tomo let out an unlady-like belch. "Yeah, me too..." She added in agreement, her hands rubbing her tummy in tandem with the glasses wearing girl.

Kagura and Osaka, unlike the two bloated whales before them, had the decency to sit back to back against each other. The cuckoolander was busy focusing on her tummy while Kagura just breathed in and out.

"That was...so much melon..." She panted, hand resting on her gut. The tomboy looked down and sighed. "God I look pregnant."

"Oohmmm...tummy..." Groaned Osaka as she tried to rub her stuffed basketball belly.

Behind them under the umbrella, Sakaki let out coos and moans as Kei happily rubbed his girlfriend's overtaught gut.

"K-Kei...you're rubbing is so good I...ohmmm..."

"Calm down Sakaki, I'm here." Said Kei in a soft voice as he continued to give his girlfriend the rubbing of a lifetime, making the dark haired girl moan, even mew at times.

Kei heard his phone vibrate in his bag and looked back at Sakaki, who nodded. "It's okay. You can answer it."

The feminine boy stood up, stretched and walked past a napping Chiyo to his beahc bag and picked up his phone. "Hello?"

"Yo, Kei, where are you?" Asked Wataru over the phone.

"Dad?"

"Dude it's almost nine. You still at the beach?"

Kei blinked. That much time has flown! Talk about literally spending the day away.

"Yeah?"

"Huh." Wataru commented. "Well in any case, please come home soon. I will need your help in the shop tomorrow. We're doing some renovating."

"Oh, okay."

"Okay, walk home safe."

"See ya at home dad." Kei hung up and turned towards the now awake Chiyo. "Hey Chiyo, sorry for the wait. We're gonna get going."

Chiyo smacked her lips, looking up at the boy. "About time..." She rubbed her eyes. "Let's wake up those two gluttons and get going."

The brown haired boy nodded. "Sure thing." He walked over and managed to get Tomo wobbling to her feet.

Yomi was a whole nother beast. "Come on~" Grunted Kei as he took Yomi's hand struggled pulling her up and then~

"Whoa!"

"Kyah!"

He pulled to hard and the result was a bloated heavy Yomi falling on top of him.

"Oh my!!" Gasped Sakaki.

"Why am I not surprised she would fall over him," murmured Kagara to herself.

Osaka and Tomo just laughed, though grimaced on their tummies.

"Oh...K-Kei..." Blushed Yomi as she looked down the dizzy-eyed boy.

Yomi rubbed her taut stomach and smiled. "That's what a healthy dose of TLC will do to a girl~"

Sakaki awoke from her bed as the sun's rays peeped in from her blinds and she sat right up, stretching her arms. She swung two legs over the bed and upon getting on the floor, she felt heavier, and her PJs were a little tighter as well. The dark haired woman looked down.

It was Sunday, and that meant no school but it didn't hurt to go over to the bakery, even if not for work. Sakaki heard her phone vibrate and she turned her head and walked over to the nightstand by her bed and inspected it.

Two text messages.

Sakaki, we have put on like, so much since last night! How about we head to the bakery and bring along our bloomers!

Tomo.

Well would Kei mind that? I mean, it is our day off and all.

She sent it, and the dark haired chubby girl checked her other message.

Hey Sakaki, you busy tonight? There's something I want to tell you in person. It's important.

Kei.

Sakaki felt her heart skip a beat. Important? In person?!

Sure thing. Sakaki paused and she bit her lip. She didn't forget the night she had with Tomo, and it was beginning to eat her on the inside out.

"I have to..." She said to herself. "I must tell Kei the truth. If I do so, he will forgive me..."

There's something else I want to confess to you too. I'll see you tonight.

Send.

Before him was both Kagura and Tomo, fully clothed in their uniforms. The much smaller clothing exposed a grand deal of flesh, bulging bellies and thickened thighs. Greeting Kei cheerily, they both walked into the bakery. Or at least tried to.

"Nnng....we can't fit through here together!" Kagura puffed, her large body jammed next to Tomo's equally fat frame as they had both tried to enter together. This had succeed in squashing the two in the door frame, making entry impossible.

"Fine...you move! You're the thinner one!" Tomo groaned, her flabby arms attempting to push Kagura out of the way.

However, the dispute was soon settled. The struggle continued, wearing the two girls out. With sweat pouring down their faces, they both moved back and practically fell onto a wooden bench outside the bakery. They huffed and puffed, Kagura wiping sweat from her face while Tomo stroked her belly.

They made short work of the treat, allowing them to catch their breath while they ate. As they finish the last crumbs, Kei spoke up.

"So, why are you two here? The bakery is closed yet you're in your uniforms."

Tomo licked her lips then explained. "Oh, I was just planning to come around here to see what was up. Maybe the new uniforms would be here or I could sample some cakes!"

"But why'd you wear the old uniform then?" Kei asked.

"I just like wearing it!" Tomo rubbed her exposed belly once more. "It's nice to have a little skin showing while I work!"

"A little?" Kagura added.

"Anyway!" Tomo brushed off Kagura's comment. "You tell your dad to make the new uniforms more revealing. At least for me anyway!"

"Oh, sure thing. Will do." Kei brought another cake around for them, a very creamy one with chocolate sauce.

"I tried inviting Sakaki along this morning, but she didn't get back to me." Tomo mentioned between bites of cake.

"Sakaki......"

Both girls looked on as Kei stared at the ground, his eyes seemingly hollow. It was like all life had been sucked from him.

"Hey Kei, you feeling okay?" Kagura asked. "You ain't looking so good."

He sighed heavily. "It's....well...I'll explain." Knowing not to spill the whole beans on the event with Yomi, he gave the girls the shortened version. "Sakaki is coming over later on, she wants to tell me something important. I want to tell her something important too...but I don't know how this is going to work out...." He sat down on the porch of the bakery. "This could be the end of our relationship....I don't want that to happen...."

As he explained, Both Kagura and Tomo stared wide eyed. Separately, both of them knew what was going on. Kagura knew what Kei would say. Tomo knew what Sakaki would say.

"Ummm...can you excuse me and Tomo for a second?" Without waiting for an answer, Kagura dragged Tomo from the bench and ran around the corner of the bakery, making sure Kei couldn't hear.

"This is bad, this is bad!" Kagura spluttered. "Do you know what's going to happen!?"

"You don't need to remind me! Both of them have pretty big skeletons in their closets!" Tomo couldn't stay still, acting frantic.

"Kei was with Yomi.....Sakaki was with you....It's never going to work! They'll split up for sure!"

"Huh? How do you know about Kei?" Tomo asked, looking very confused.

"That doesn't matter!" Kagura shouted. "It's way too late to do anything about it now....if we try to stall either of them we'll just come off as very suspicious!"

Tomo nodded. "Yeah, I know how guilty Sakaki felt about that! Nothing would sway her from telling the truth!"

Kagura sighed. "I guess all we can do is let things take their course and just pray that things work themselves out...."

"Yeah...I mean...Sakaki is an understanding person! She'd forgive him...right?"

"I just hope...we can't let Kei know we're aware! Just go back to him and act like nothing happened." Kagura walked back to the bakery, along with Tomo. Sitting back down, they stayed with Kei for a while longer, though the mood had dampened significantly.

"Be with you?" Said Kei and Sakaki out loud. The dark haired girl saw a shadow loom over her and saw Tomo offering a hand. Sakaki accepted it, standing up.

"Look Sakaki, I never meant to steal Kei away from you. I..." She blushed. "Wanna share you both." She added.

"Same here," added Kagura with a smile. "Kei packs it really good in the sack, and Sakaki is one of the most kinkiest subs I have ever seen!"

"Hey!" They both shouted at once at the former athlete.

"One thing is for certain, you both are guilty of adultery," said the short haired brunette. "Kei had sex with us and Yomi that night in the bakery, and Sakaki and me had a jolly ole time downstairs, plus she and Tomo almost had sex at the club."

"You had what with Yomi!" Said Sakaki with a loud voice.

"You did what with Tomo!" Shouted Kei in surprise.

"And with tonight~" Tomo brought the couple in. "I think it's safe to say we're all on the ship of sin, why not indulge! Besides, we love the both of you, but we never would have gotten here if it weren't for you two love birds." She put their hands together.

"I believe it's time we do a 'kiss-and-make-up-followed-by-orgy' segment?" Tomo grinned, seeing the confused Sakaki and Kei look into each other's eyes.
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: Oh crap! The jig is up!

choices: Tomo interrupts the embrace and makes her move!
Tomo picks her moment, allow them to embrace
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
With eyes locked, the two lovers stared deeply. Kagura and Tomo stood back and looked at them in excitement, as if they were watching a dramatic love story on TV waiting for the main character and their love interest to kiss. It didn't take long before things finally came full circle, as Kei felt his hands squeezes tight and Sakaki's eyes began to sparkle with tears. Kei was take aback as he felt Sakaki shift all her weight onto him as she embraced him tight, sobbing into his shoulder.

"Kei...please forgive me!" Sakaki cried more and more, Kei stroking her back as a way of trying to comfort her. "I don't want to lose you....I completely forgive you for your actions...please have it in your heart...."

"Sakaki..." He held her close in return, feeling her soft body envelop his own. "You shouldn't worry. I would have forgiven you even if tonight went as you'd envisioned. I'm not so fickle as to leave you over something you didn't intend. There's a big difference between that and simply cheating on someone." He squeezed some of the rolls on her belly. "You're beautiful Sakaki, inside and out. I would never leave you, I know you'd never do anything immoral without good reason."

"Thank you Kei....I love you too..." Sakaki reached upwards and wrapped her arms around his neck, kissing him softly to which he did back.

As the two embraced each other lovingly, Tomo and Kagura gleefully watched on. "I do love a happy ending~" Kagura put an arm around Tomo, bringing her close and squashing her head into her own pillowly breasts.

"It's far from over Kags, we've got all night left and we're going to live it up~" Tomo licked her lips as she continued looking onwards at Kei and Sakaki. "We just saved their relationship, so me thinks we should celebrate!"
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: They talk...and make amends.

choices: We cut to Monday. Time for a physical at school!
How's Wataru been doing?
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
Kei and Sakaki gave Tomo and Kagura dirty looks. "Privacy please?" They both asked at the same time. Tomo and Kagura felt a bit intimidated. They sure look scary!

"Yeah...me and Kags will give you some alone time..." Tomo stepped out of the room, Kagura giving the couple a wink before joining her friend.

Kei sighed as he and Sakaki plopped down on the bed. "So..." He fiddled with his fingers, looking up at his amazonian girlfriend. "Want to-" He was cut off by the sudden kiss Sakaki planted on his lips, and she was on top, hands cupping his cheeks.

"I know...I...I want to make it up to you Kei. I want to show you...just how much I truly love you..." Sakaki said, tears of joy in her eyes as she looked down at her smaller love.

Kei smiled back, and the two embraced once more, lips to lips.

-x-

Outside the door, Tomo and Kagura grinned when they started hearing the two love birds cry out of bliss and pleasure and the creaks on the bed signifying Kei as a jackhammer to Sakaki's concrete. The two girls looked at each other and grinned, high five-ing each other.

Mission Accomplished.
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: Tomo picks her moment, allow them to embrace

choices: Continue on as they reach their destination
Skip over to a different event
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
Whilst the darkened city streets were mostly silent for the night, any peace that had been was promptly shattered by a lone car careening around the roads at breakneck speed. The exhaust sputtered out black fumes and the metal frame clattered against the rugged tires. The car made it's journey across the city, swerving at the slightest turns and the brakes slamming on whenever a red light prevented the car from going any further. As the car reached yet another red lit traffic light, the driver slammed her fist against the steering wheel.

"God damn it, nearly made that one too!" Yukari slumped back into her carseat as she waited for the the lights to turn green again. In the passenger seat, Wataru sat with his hands firmly grasped around the base of the car seat. Being his very first time enduring Yukari's infamous driving, he was naturally shaken by the experience.

"It's probably best you didn't make it." He added as he relished the rare moment of the car being stopped. "Could've ran the red if you kept going."

"I hate how that system works." Yukari muttered. "I'll be going through when the lights turn amber and then next thing I know there's the police pulling me over! Trust me when I say that getting your license back when it's taken off you is a real pain..." Her head shot up as she saw the lights turn green, slamming her foot on the accelerator with full force.

In seemingly record time, the car broke to a halt in front of a rather small little house in the middle of a suburb. Wataru looked over to see the home, being rather quaint and simple but still looking cosy. Yukari glanced over herself before fiddling about with her handbrake.

"Damn it....stay in! Can't afford to shell out another 8000 yen for repairs!" She yelled before wedging the loose component into it's slot.

"So....this is the home of your friend?" Wataru asked, to take his mind off the deathtrap of a car.

"Yeah, but don't hold your breath waiting. She's the kind who always worries about how she looks." Yukari put on a high pitched mocking voice. "Does this make me look fat? My make up is going to smudge!"

"I guess you can't blame someone for trying to look presentable." Wataru added before noticing the house at their side had it's door open, with a tall yet petite figure walking over to the car. On closer inspection, the person was wearing a long blue dress with her hair hanging loose, along with a fair amount of make up and jewellery on her.

"Hey there Yukari." Nyamo said, taking a look at how her friend hadn't bothered to change out of her teacher clothing. "Could've put a little effort in you know..."

"Nah, not worth the time! Anyways, here's the man himself!" Yukari shook her hand a little in the direction of Wataru, to which he smiled and waved over to Nyamo as she entered the backseat.

"Good evening. I'm Wataru, but you probably already know due to word of mouth, right?"

"Yes, Yukari mentioned you." Nyamo responded. "I'm Minamo Kurosawa, it's a pleasure to meet you." She gave her head a nod before buckling up.

"Oh come on, don't be so formal!" An annoyed voice yelled from the front. "Just call yourself Nyamo! Your real name is stupid anyway!"

"Nyamo..." Wataru mused. "It's a rather nice nickname."

"Yeah....you could say.." Nyamo blushed, from both the flattery of Wataru and the embarrassment of Yukari.

"Alrighty, let's get ourselves moving! The night is young!" Shifting the gears and flooring the pedals, Yukari revved up and sped down through the dimly lit streets as the trio began their night out.
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: How's Wataru been doing?

choices: They find a movie to watch.
Suddenly Yukari's belly rumbles. She is hungry!
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
As Yukari cackled like a wicked witch, Wataru was gripping his seat for dear life. Nyamo in the backseat was doing likewise.

"Does this usually happen?" He yelled out as they made a wild turn, sending some garbage cans into an alley. A cat scream sounded out.

"ALL THE TIME!" Nyamo replied back, tears streaming down her face. Yukari was laughing her socks off as they drove into a parking lot and stopped dead center in a spot.

"Awesome!" Yukari turned towards her compadres. "Lets do that ag-"

Wataru's hair was now full grey and his mouth was foaming, and Nyamo had her eyes rolled over. Yukari rolled her eyes.

"Light weights."

-x-

"So...what movie we gonna watch again?" Asked Yukari as she stood outside the car with her arms crossed. Nyamo was fine, standing next to her. Wataru on the other hand...not so much. He was staggering out of the car and thankfully his hair returned back to normal.

"Don't care...I think I lost ten years of my life..."

"Welcome to my world," weeped Nyamo in sympathy.

The two of them were brought close together by Yukari, was in the center with her arms around their shoulders.

"Okay lightweights. Let's go watch some movies!" She marched out of the parking lot, tugging Wataru and Nyamo as they got to the booth and the screen which showed which picture's were playing.

"Go on and pick, I'm fine with anything," Wataru shrugged as Nyamo and Yukari talked things over.
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: Continue on as they reach their destination

choices: Yukari needs help deciding on what to order
Yukari needs help carrying her massive order
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
Within the group, a loud prominent gurgle could be audibly heard. Yukari gave a chuckle as she scratched the back of her head a little. "Guess all that driving has gotten me a little on the hungry side!" She whipped out a heavily worn wallet from a pocket on her skirt, examining the funds she had.. "If you two are fine with waiting her, I'll head over and sort everything out. Food, tickets, the works!"

With the loudmouth teacher making her way to join a queue for some food, Wataru and Nyamo were left alone together with their only choice being to wait. Nyamo eyed up a small bench by a wall, to which Wataru noticed and sat down at, soon joined by the other teacher.

"Yukari tells me you're quite the accomplished baker." Nyamo piped up. She wanted to make her impressions count, now for a brief moment Yukari was out of the picture. "I've been to your place once or twice before, but it's been quite a while since then."

Listening in, Wataru put his hand to his chin and tapped it a few times. He then suddenly had a thought and proceeded to look through a bag.

"Well in that case, care to have a reminder of my cooking?" Wataru had brought with him a bag to the cinema, which had by some miracle been able to survive the pounding it received in Yukari's car. Looking around a little, from the bag he pulled out a rather big chocolate pastry, a little battered from the car journey with cream oozing from the cracks made on the treat.

"I know that the cost of cinema food can be rather expensive, so I took the liberty of bringing some of my own goods with me. Of course, make sure the staff don't find out!" He gave a warm chuckle as he handed the pastry over to Nyamo. Making sure none of the cream dripped onto her dress, she took a bite from it and savoured the taste.

"Oh goodness....this is delicious! I guess Yukari wasn't lying about the taste...not to mention how generous this Wataru is." Nyamo thought to herself as she bit into the chocolaty dessert more and more until she popped the final morsel into her mouth.

"Mmmm...that was divine Wataru. Thank you very much for sharing that with me." Nyamo licked some cream from her lips afterwards. She was impressed by Wataru's cooking, secretly longing for another taste of his works. Part of her hoped that Yukari had order a vast amount of her own food, giving herself a better chance of enjoying the rest of the pastries. However, she quickly dismissed these as she felt unusually selfish for doing so.

"The pleasure is all mine Nyamo. Please, help yourself at any time!" Wataru smiled in response, happy to see anyone praising his cooking.

"Yo! Guys!" Yukari was currently situated at the front desk of the queue she had waited in. "I need a little hand here, mind coming over and helping out?"
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: Suddenly Yukari's belly rumbles.

choices: The film begins, Yukari pigging out as per usual
The film begins, Nyamo pigging out to take her mind off things
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
Hearing her call, Wataru and Nyamo came over to the counter to see what she needed help with. Needless to say, they weren't surprised to see that Yukari had gotten herself essentially a three course meal worth of cinema food.

"Yeah, I'm going to need a bit of a hand here. I'll handle the popcorn and drinks, you can both carry the nachos and ice cream." Yukari ordered, picking up her share of the purchases. In one arm she carried an extra large cup of cola, whilst her other arm she tucked two oversized bags of popcorn, both of them sweet flavoured and drenched in melted butter. The two sets of nachos she had were also drenched, both covered in plenty of cheese sauce and salsa, along with a fair amount of jalapenos too. Her ice cream choices were at least six mini tubs, all differing flavours from rich chocolates to mild vanillas.

"Ah...you got this for all of us to share, right Yukari?" Nyama asked sheepishly, baffled at how much had been ordered.

"Uh...yes?" Yukari replied in an unconvincing tone. Clearly her eyes were far bigger than her stomach.

Leaning in to her ear, Wataru whispered. "Don't worry, you can have the rest of the pastries if Yukari ends up stuffing herself. Either way, I'll make sure to keep both of you in check." Laughing a little, he followed on with Yukari as she was ready to go to their screen, with Nyama quickly catching up. Already she was liking Wataru a lot, he seemed very calm and considerate, plus how he handled Yukari's antics were far better than what she could do.

"So, what kind of film did you choose for us Yukari?" Wataru asked as she was already scarfing down big handfuls of popcorn greedily.

"Mmgh? Oh, yeah. We're going to see Blood Massacre Carnage IV: The Murderering!" She thrust her hand forward for emphasis, which was soon back to gobbling popcorn. "You wouldn't believe how many pints of fake blood they used in the filming..."

Whilst Wataru felt somewhat disappointed at the choice, he looked over to Nyamo, completely silent and extremely pale. Not getting a response from her, he took his free hand and held it onto her own, rubbing her hand softly as Yukari entered the screen with them in tow.

"Just squeeze whenever your scared, okay?" He informed in a gentle tone, to which he got a small smile and a nod from Nyamo.
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: Yukari needs help carrying her massive order

choices: Wataru returns with the popcorn buckets and...
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
As the movie started at a typical high school of sort, it cut off to a basement of a man who looked like a shoddy and fat Jason Vorhees revving up a chainsaw on a man in a business-suit, who was gagged and squirming. As the chainsaw came down...

Nyamo grabbed one of the massive buckets of popcorn by her colleague's feet and began to scarf it down, closing her eyes as the sound of gore and screaming sounded out. Yukari was laughing a bit while Wataru was a bit put off.

"You think this is funny?" He asked with a quriked eye.

"This stuff is so fake!" Yukari chuckled as she slurped some cola deeply. "I mean, the guy isn't as struggling as much, the blood looks like watered down ketchu-" She continued to laugh as the chainsaw began to go through the other still attached arm, making her belly jiggle a bit. "And that arm is made of plasti-!" She slapped her knee as she sat back and guffawed.

Nyamo however was still attacking her popcorn with a fervor, something Wataru noticed.

"Hungry?"

Nyamo shook her head as the chainsaw began to go to the leg, Wataru didn't pay attention. He only saw Nyamo eat faster as she practically inhale the buttery popcorn.

"Oh. You eat to cope with fear?"

Nyamo opened her eyes, ashamed as she looked at the older man and nodded. "It's always been a prob-" She was cut off by the last leg being sewn off, then returned to eating at a breakneck pace, whimpering all the while.

"The leg's are so plastic! That is a sound effect I saw in video game once!" Yukari was holding her sides as she ate some ice cream. "Oh god...this is too much...too over the top...hehe..." The long haired woman began to stuff her face as she reached for her popcorn bucket...

"Eh?! It's gone!" Thankfully they were the only ones in the theaters, otherwise Wataru would hear the onslaught of "shhhhh!" and glares at their direction. She looked over...

And saw Nyamo eating the SECOND large bucket as the chainsaw began to decapitate the man.

"I wanted some popcorn..." Pouted Yukari as she crossed her arms. Wataru sighed.

"I'll be right back. Make sure Minamo doesn't choke or anything." He stood up and walked past the bloating up Nyamo to the front lobby. "How many buckets?" He asked, turning back towards Yukari.

"I want two for myself. For Nyamo..." She looked at the now relieved woman who was slowing down, but her belly could easily be seen rising under her long blue dress. "Maybe two, nah, make it four for her."
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: The film begins, Nyamo pigging out to take her ...

choices: The two women were stuffed and food-drunk beyond belief.
Nyamo outdid Yukari, her dress near ripping as she looked passed out and in pain
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.content:
Wataru returned in the dark theater carrying three buckets on top of each other as he walked up the stairs and down the aisle towards the girls. Apparently the boarding high school just went to lock-down due to the Fat-Vorhees Clone locking down the doors. And he was prowling the lower floors with not one, but TWO chainsaws.

And he saw Minamo on a bucket of ice cream, with two more buckets close by. Yukari was defending her two nachos and her remaining three ice cream tiny tubs for herself. She gestured Wataru to hurry quickly. "Her stomach is a black hole!"

And then cue the screams and Nyamo whimpering as she stuffed more ice cream bites in her mouth, sort of smeared with butter and vanilla and chocolate.

"I've noticed." Wataru said plainly as he sat down between the two girls, the tubby Yukari eating nachos with little manners(probably due to her DEGAFing about the movie and laughing at it) and Minamo's coping mechanism of eating while scared.

"Minamo." He said, his hand on hers as the girl looked over to him. "It's okay...I'm right here." He smiled lightly. He remembered seeing Kei being scared of some horror movies and he always reassured him that it was all make believe, even as the man's chainsaws were extendable and sliced the asshole victim to the female protagonist down the center at the stairwell. "It's all fake. Okay?"

"O...Okay..." Nyamo swallowed some ice cream and licked her lips, finally noticing how messy her mouth was. "Oh my! I...do we have napkins?" Wataru looked around, and saw none, even as Yukari finished the second Nacho plate.

"I'll grab it..." He stood up and walked past her. "My knees will fall out of my legs at this rate..."

And the movie continued as the massacre went up five floors, with nerds, busty bimbos, teachers getting the "axe" or so to say after the chainsaws broke. The female protagonist finally got the drop on the villain with a pen, stabbing his neck and sending him sprawling to the ground as the girl chopped him up with his axes, blood splattering on the screen...

And this took over an hour until the girl killed the Vorhee-clone, knelt down and removed the mask, and it was none other than her uncle!

Wataru returned to the aisle on what was his eighth trip, carryign two large soda bottles and looked up at the screen. "Movie's over?" He asked as the protagonist began to cry, and it was cheesy to boot.
1321211111112112211111111111212212122122.title: Wataru returns with the popcorn buckets and...

choices: Sakaki starts to soften as the weeks pass.
Sakaki's friends are concerened as she gets tubby.
Sakaki wants to repay her wife with a special request of her own.
133.content:
Sakaki blushed heavily at her usually demure wife radiating confidence and purpose as she kissed her hard on the lips.

This night was a gift from her Kaori, a mumbled dream the catalyst and a more thorough explanation about that mumble from a mortified Sakaki the driving force of this evening. It was a kink of hers, she explained to Kaorin, to be fed against her will, to lose her fit figure, replaced with waves of soft fat.

Kaorin, for her part, didn't turn away in disgust, didn't call Sakaki sick or twisted, instead she held her close, Sakaki cooing a bit at how adorable her wife looked so determined.

"I'll do this for you, Sakaki. I'll feed you and fatten you up. Just tell me exactly how you want me to do it."

So Sakaki had whispered her instructions into her twenty four year old wife's neck as she kissed along her collarbone, yelled more out as they made love, murmuring the last of it as she held Kaorin close.

And now, she thought, it was finally happening.

A small cart of food was soon towed in by Kaorin, her brown eyes meeting Sakaki's dark ones.

"Is my darling wife hungry?"

Sakaki moaned a bit as she replied, hands on her toned middle. "No, dear, I'm much too full from dinner."

An eclair was soon fished out and held towards Sakaki's mouth, thrusting forward and parting her lips a moment later.

"You're lying. I know you're still hungry and you'll finish this cart!"

Sakaki chewed and swallowed, barely allowed to breathe again before two rice balls entered her mouth.

All the while she saw Kaorin's eyes questioning her.

Was this okay?

Am I doing this right?

Sakaki gave her a swift nod before more food followed.

Twenty minutes after there was nothing left on the cart but crumbs, Sakaki was digesting, letting out delicate burps as Kaorin gently cupped the taut and red middle.

"Thank you, Kaori."

Kaorin nodded, soon closing her eyes as she nestled against Sakaki's side. The taller woman stared down at her wife, offering a prayer of thanks for being allowed to reconnect with Kaorin in college and marrying her shortly after both graduated.
133.title: Force fed?

choices: The Next Day.
Cue Dream Sequence!
Elsewhere…
14.content:
Life was normal for Miss Osaka.

She, however, was not.

Granted, Ayumu “Osaka” Kasuga wasn’t exactly Joe Everyman, she did change a little bit. More specifically, her appetite did. She found herself taking slightly larger portions, but not much else. The results of her increased food intake didn’t show yet, but whenever Osaka started feeling larger, she sat by Yomi, and started feeling much better. No one else notice, until one day, when Chiyo brought some watermelon to share at lunch.

“Hey, Chiyo-chan?” asked Osaka.
“Mmphf?” replied Chiyo, her face stuffed with a melon slice.
“Is it true that if y’all eat a watermelon seed, it starts growin’ inside ya stomach?”

Silence fell, hard and heavy. All eyes turn to the melon.

Chiyo was the first to speak up.
“I don’t think that the inside of your tummy-“
“Oh My God!” yelled Tomo, “That’s a serious issue! We need to be more careful about eating this stuff!”
“Yeah!” cried Osaka, “Ya probably start balloonin’ up, and everythin’ begins tasting like watermelon!”
“Man,” said Tomo, “If a watermelon started growing in your stomach, I bet you start looking like Yomi!”
“Ack! Must you always bring that up?” exclaimed Yomi, “I’m not the only one packing it away here! Look at Osaka over there, stuffing her face.”
“She has been eating more as of late…” said Sakaki, not even looking up from her book.
“Wha…?” spat Osaka, “I ain’t gettin’ big. Uh… Uh… I plead the fifth!”
“Umm…” said Yomi, “ ‘The fifth’ is a part of the American Constitution. We’re in Japan. How did you know that and still fail your history test?”
“Uh… I really don’t know…” mused Osaka.

The remainder of the day went on (relatively) normal after that, and Osaka went home once school ended. While she was getting changed into her pajamas, she poked at the little layer of flab on her stomach, but thought nothing of it as she went to bed.
14.title: Mmm… Melons…

Yukari Tanizaki
