151.content:
"Heeeeey Yomi!" yelled Tomo, "Aren't you on a diet?"
"Huh? Wha..?" said Yomi, looking up from the abnormally (compared to her normal intake) large amounts of food on her tray.
"Maybe I'm on a break."
"And maybe," Tomo retorted, "This 'break' is going straight to your thighs." She poked Yomi's slightly flabby legs, making them jiggle a little.
“St-Stop that!” Yomi cried, “Th-th-that’s water weight! It’ll all come out later!”
“Doubt it…” said Tomo.

Yomi decided that auguring with idiocy only makes you stoop to their level, and she took her food and went back inside to eat the rest of her large meal in peace. Tomo was blissfully unaware of what she started, and contently started at the sky, and later got into an argument with Chiyo-chan as to whether or not a certain cloud was a cat or a bunny-rabbit. Meanwhile, Yomi wolfed down her food, over thinking the war that Tomo started, that Tomo herself was unaware of.

“She thinks I’m fat…
151.title: Well, It's Not That Bad... Yet

choices: After a month, Yomi is chubby, & so has Tomo after her speed eating contests
After a month, Yomi hasn't gained weight, but Tomo has
After a month, Yomi has plimped up
1511.content:
Upon arriving home, Yomi grabbed every bag of sweets, dessert, snacks, junk food, whatever into her arms, and darted up the stairs. She noticed that the flesh on her legs was already trembling, quivering along with the slight amount of pudge in her belly. That was what had lead Tomo into calling her fat, a comment she’d soon see was entirely untrue. Tomo had always insisted on competing against Yomi on everything, and she was tired of having that hyperactive girl constantly try to prove her point.

She shoved a cookie into her mouth, chewing it with glee. Already she was assured this was going to be fun. Yes, she’d probably regret this later she knew in the back of her head, but for the moment, as she shoved massive oversized cupcakes into her mouth alongside brownies and other rather sugar laden snacks, she didn’t truly care. As she felt a pressure build up from within her abdomen, pushing against the inside of her stomach, she realized she didn’t care in that moment.

The next day, she awoke in her bed, having cleaned up the wrappers the night before. There was not a trace of evidence of the previous night’s binge on her body. That wasn’t too surprising. She needed to be consistent, after all, if she wanted to prove Tomo wrong. This would take awhile, maybe weeks or even months. In the end, though, she’d prove Tomo wrong.

She’d show that hyperactive brat what fat really looked like.

This overeating trend continued into lunchtime, where she snuck her hand into Tomo’s back pocket to withdraw some of her money. She should be paying for it, after all.

Well, actually she didn’t physically steal Tomo’s money, though she wanted to. No, she just beat Tomo at a speed eating contest. “Aw man! How did I lose, again?” Tomo asked, clutching her sore belly in pain.

“Because I’m fat, remember?” Yomi grumbled, agitatedly.

Tomo sat up at that, laughing, “Oh yeah! That’s right! Hahaha!”

“Yomi isn’t fat,” Chiyo-chan pointed out, “Her body weight is still within the recommended parameters a girl of her size should be—”

“Blah-blah-blah! Yomi’s a butterball in the making.”

How odd that Tomo was somewhat on the money.

For once.
1511.title: I’ll show her fat!”

choices: After class, Osaka asks Yomi how her breasts are so big...and follows her path
Yomi confronts Tomo about both of their gains...only to see Tomo doesn't care
15111.content:
"Haha! Yomi, you fatso! You spilled all over yourself again!" Tomo laughed, clutching her belly as Yomi dripped Miso soup over her thighs. It burned a little, heat still wafting up in plumes of smoke off of her chubby thighs. Hastily, she wiped it off, her arms trembling from the shock of going back and forth, back and forth, just to remove the offending liquid. Man, her fingers were starting to look thick, Yomi came to realize, a frown on her slightly cherubic face.

She had kept up the routine for the past month, and, in retrospect, maybe it was one of her stupider ideas. She had kept up with it initially out of spite, but now she was starting to feel her attack backfiring. Sure, she was going to get fat just to prove Tomo wrong, but if she did that, there was one crucial flaw to her plan that Yomi now saw blatantly obvious in front of her: she'd get fat.

Sure, fat wasn't a good way to describe her yet. Just chubby. Her breasts still extended more than her stomach, and most of her flab had gone to her hips and breasts anyway, but she still had some chub on her gut. Her thighs pressed gently together on the seat, not thick enough to spill out in all directions, but just enough to make Yomi cringe in self-disgust. Her face had even rounded out, her jawline less defined than before.

Still, there was one good side effect.

"Hey, you aren't looking all that small yourself, pudgy," Yomi shot back, a sarcastic grin on her lips, glasses glinting off the light from outside.

Despite Tomo laughing her off, she had probably packed on just as much as Yomi did. Her belly was now thick and plump, rolling over the waistband of her skirt, her pudgy hands resting on it as her legs kicked out in her laughter. When she laughed, Tomo's double chin grew more prominent, quite a spectacle to see. You'd think she'd never be able to call anyone else fat, but Tomo's logic never ceased to amaze Yomi as it did this very moment.

"Aw, Yomi, you're such a naive girl..." Tomo replied, standing up, resting a foot on the table as she rested her elbow on it, "It doesn't matter what weight I'm at, just you."

"Actually, both of you are kinda gettin' thunder thighs," Kagura mumbled, "Maybe you should work out with me a litt--"

"No one asked for your input, Number 2!" Tomo snapped, pointing a pudgy finger at Kagura's nose, "I make the calls here!""

"Since when was I number 2?" Kagura asked.

"Since I demoted Osaka to three."

"What was ah demoted in?" Osaka asked, in her slow drawl.
15111.title: Who's Laughing Now?...No, really, who is?

choices: Doubling the food for the contest should be enough to win again... right?
Yomi tries to eat her meals faster so she can be better prepared against Tomo
15113.content:
Where did it all go wrong, Yomi thought as she stared at her nearly finished bowl of miso soup.

Her food intake had increased dramatically over the past month. With the extra money obtained from constantly beating Tomo in their daily lunch contests Yomi was able to buy a variety of donuts, chips, candy bars, cupcakes and other snacks to last her through the school day in addition to a pre-sleep junk food pig-out. Plus as her body adjusted to her new routine she decided to add in a small meal after school - usually a sandwich and large drink - which will no doubt become larger over time.

And as expected, Yomi gained weight - 32 pounds in all. There were some major changes to her body from the last month (though nowhere close to how big she needed to be to show Tomo what fat really was). Her cheeks grew rounder and had the slightest of double chins connecting them when she shifted her neck down. Her breasts were heftier (requiring a new set of bras to contain) and sat on top of a belly that seemingly soaked in most of her new pounds as Yomi's old school uniform was barely able to contain it. And her thighs had thickened to the point that they, much to her embarrassment, slightly brushed against each other as she walked.

But as the weeks progressed something else was beginning to change - something so subtle that Yomi didn't even notice it at first. Tomo was somehow catching up! It was only the prior week when Yomi realized how much faster Tomo was devouring her food. It was a bit concerning but nothing to worry over since she was sure to regain her advantage as she got used to all the extra food she was eating daily.

Then the unthinkable happened.

"I win again, Yomi!"

At the start of the week Tomo actually began to win!

Staring daggers at the other girl, who was dancing around like a maniac, Yomi thought about the worst/weirdest aspect regarding the turn of events. How is it that Tomo looks like she hasn't gained a single pound in the last month? HOW?!

"-- and even with that fat gut of yours Yomi still lost!" Tomo slapping Yomi's midsection broke her train of thought.

After slamming her bowl and what little contents it had left onto Tomo's head, Yomi considered her current predicament and how to fix it....
15113.title: Not According to Plan

choices: Yomi starts winning agan, and gets fatter...
Tomo continues to win, and gains weight...
151131.content:
Finally, the idea came into Yomi's head to increase the amount eaten. Surely Tomo's speed came from her becoming adjusted to eating the same general amount of food. However, Yomi's stomach had no doubt stretched due to her constant binging. She rested a pudgy hand on her stomach before snapping, a determined glint in her eyes as Tomo cheered for her most recent victory, "Double or nothing!"

"Huh?"

"You heard me."

"Yeah, I heard you. I just don't know what you said."

"Oh, right, well, we double the amount of food eaten, and...yeah..."

"Why? You wanna get fatter?"

"No! That's not it at all. Why're you so nervous? You aren't scared, are you?"

"Scared?" Tomo's face twisted into a hotblooded expression, a grin spreading across her cheeks, "Oh, I'm scared of nothing! I'll beat you again! Because that's what you are? Beaten! Yeah, and...I'm kinda out of original things to say..."
151131.title: Double or Nothing!

choices: Continue with their large meals
A few weeks pass. Does Tomo regain the advantage?
1511311.content:
Tomo's so easy to rattle! Yomi chuckled as she took a big bite out of her double cheeseburger, the first of four on her tray along with an extra-large milkshake and large fries.

With both girls having to eat twice the amount of food Yomi was back to easily beating Tomo in their lunchtime contests along with the additional bonus of stuffing herself with even more food midday. The larger winnings also meant that she was able to buy more food for her after school meal - something that was becoming more necessary as what she usually had for dinner weren't enough to sate her appetite.

And the weight began to pile on at a faster rate than before.

In little over two weeks Yomi's body had ballooned to the point where she had to buy a new school uniform soon, preferably one a few sizes larger just to give her some room to grow. Her belly noticeably stuck out and occasionally even peeked out from underneath her shirt. Her butt had also grown which caused problems during mornings when she tried to fit into her skirt (which looked more like a miniskirt on someone her size).

And soon I'll finally be big enough to teach Tomo a well-deserved lesson!

Yomi imagined herself much fatter - so much so that only a loveseat could comfortably hold her ass. Her belly covered nearly her entire thighs when she sat down and shook as she laughed heartily between forkfuls of cake. Prostrating before her was a defeated Tomo, admitting that the seated girl was a better and faster eater and most importantly so much fatter than someone like her ever could have imagined! Yomi had won - she had shown the annoying brat what fat really looked like....

Wait a minute... something seems very off with that. But with Tomo acknowledging me as her superior it can't be all that bad!

A pair of hands suddenly slammed against the table, shaking Yomi from her reverie and causing her to look up and see a pair of eyes staring right back at her. "Hmmm... so this is where you go everyday after school. Stuffing your fat face with even more food! I finally understand what you've been doing all this time!"

"You... do?" Yomi was certain that Tomo didn't really know the reasons behind all this but was nevertheless interested in hearing her explanation.

Tomo crossed her hands and nodded solemnly. "I should have realized it from the beginning! Because Yomi-chan was always a fatty you didn't care how many more pounds you put on just to prepare against someone as tough to beat as myself!"

Then with a determined look the other girl pointed at Yomi, index finger only centimeters away from her chubby face. "But now that I discovered your secret I'm not going to lose anymore!"

Yomi blinked as Tomo turned, her shirt momentarily lifting up and showing off her midsection in the process, and sped towards the counter. Was it me or did I just see a slight layer of belly fat on Tomo? Nah! My mind's probably just playing tricks on me. And with that she went back to her second burger.

Within minutes Tomo returned and sat across from Yomi. On her tray were eight double cheeseburgers, two large milkshakes and two large sets of fries. She just raised her eyebrows, implying to the skinnier girl that there was no way she could finish all of that.
1511311.title: Spoils of Victory

choices: Tomo had gotten chubby
Tomo was JUST as skinny as before
15113112.content:
"Alright! Finished!" Tomo cackled, resting a hand on her bloated middle as she giggled confidently.

Yomi couldn't believe it. After all that time and effort put into sabotaging Tomo's victory, after increasing the amount of food to fatten herself up like a cow, Yomi still saw the day where Tomo beat her. She was totally beaten now. It wasn't like she could just raise the bar and add more food. Then she'd be lucky if, by the end of their high school carrier, Yomi could even lift herself out of her seat.

Speaking of which, Yomi was no longer pudgy or plump. Such a girl would look slender next to Yomi. Her belly spilled onto her lap, her arms thick and doughy. She had risen above the 200 lbs limit that Yomi had believed few people her age would cross. Fate, it seemed, had a sense of irony.

Still, something else was wrong with this picture.

"There's no way you ate all that food and and aren't a fatty," Yomi replied, her lips twisted into a defiant snarl hours later. What was that girl's secret? Her metabolism must be on steroids if she could just digest all that food so effortlessly. What was she doing? Running miles after school every day? Maybe she was bulimic? That didn't seem like Tomo's style at--

"Hey, Yomi! Are you going to get a new zip code?"

"Shut up, you idiot!" Yomi snapped, turning around to see her friend. However, something caught her eye. Tomo raised her hands so high her shoulders actually untucked and pulled up her shirt. It was at that moment Yomi saw...
15113112.title: A few weeks pass. Does Tomo regain the advantage?

choices: During gym Yomi finds out that a friend has also noticed Tomo's weight gain
Yomi tries to find a way to convince Tomo to copy her eating habits
151131121.content:
Despite her metabolism's best effort, there was a small bit of tummy fat on her. So Tomo was capable of putting on weight, albeit currently at a very slow pace!

These changes had to have been taking place for a while. How come I never noticed this before? After thinking it over Yomi concluded that it was because there was still a large difference in weight between the two of them it was not something that would have caught her attention early on.

"Oh? Is Yomi in awe of my beautiful body?" Posing for Yomi, she continued, "It must be frustrating to see such a thin body be able to even out-eat an elephant!" Tomo began to laugh maniacally once more.

Yomi's eyebrows furrowed and her glasses took on a glint that would have immediately caught Tomo's attention if she saw it. Maybe I should amend my resolution to include completely slowing down a certain girl's metabolism.
151131121.title: Ever So Slowly

choices: Yomi - 200, Tomo - 140
Yomi - 230, Tomo - 160
1511311212.content:
At once, the idea birthed itself in Yomi's mind. A little grin on her lips, Yomi drew nearer, chuckling slightly. "Ya know, Tomo, you've been doing pretty good at these contests."

"Yeah, I know. Please, don't shower me with too much praise," laughed Tomo, smirking, her dimples evidence that her body was slowly changing.

"But I still eat more food than you on a regular basis," Yomi chuckled, smirking, extending a finger high into the air in triumph.

"What? Yeah, so what're you trying to get at...?" Tomo asked, her body tingling as even she became aware of Yomi's implications.

The bespectacled girl grinned as she declared, loudly, "I challenge you to a weight gain contest! Whoever gains the most weight in three months wins the prize!" Yomi grinned, well aware that, in the event of such a contest, Tomo would certainly win the prize because Yomi would just let her do whatever. In the meantime, Yomi would diet down into her svelte self, and Tomo would blow up like a balloon.

Brilliant.

"Wait, I'm not--ah, to hell with it, if I don't do it, then you'll win! And I can't let you win! Fine! I accept!"

"Okay, guess it's time to weigh ourselves, just to know how much we gain and lose."

"Fine!"
1511311212.title: Manipulation...

choices: After school Yomi order's a 'light' meal while Tomo goes all out
In Gym Tomo's able to sneak in some snacks while Yomi attempts to start her diet
15113112121.content:
"Whoa! I never knew that Yomi was such a fat-ass! It's a good thing this contest is about how much you gain in three months and not who the fatter girl is!"

Yomi laughed along with Tomo though for a different reason. Laugh all you want; in three months you'll have gained more and weigh far more than me! Having taken a closer look at the other girl Yomi also noted, Plus it's not like 140 is svelte for someone your height. You're well on your way to being a butterball, Tomo!

Tomo smiled confidently. "I definitely have the upper hand here. A slim girl like me will have a far easier time putting on weight than a blob like you!"

Can't argue with that, Yomi giggled to herself. She couldn't believe that she didn't think of this idea before! I really should have properly thought over my original plans. Yomi looked below and first took notice of her gargantuan breasts, which despite their size did nothing to block the view of her dome-like stomach. Though it's too late for that, she sighed.

What better way for Tomo to learn what fat really was than to have an ample belly of her own; one far larger than Yomi's?
15113112121.title: Yomi - 200, Tomo - 140

choices: Yomi successfully loses weight, and Tomo gets bigger than her
Yomi's diet fails, and they both fatten up
151131121211.content:
"I don't get it," Tomo mumbled, staring at Yomi's meager cheeseburger, "Why do you only have that?"

"Oh, no reason," Yomi replied, nibbling into it as Tomo shoveled food from her five platters of food into her mouth at a record pace. For Yomi, this was a meager amount. Her stomach bubbled uncomfortably, craving food, but she had to deny it. She seriously needed to lose weight, and she figured she'd just gradually cut back, while Tomo dove headlong into hedonism.

"You're planning something else to beat me, aren't you!?" Tomo snapped, "I see what you're doing. Trying to make me lighten up, think you're not a challenge. Well, I AIN'T FALLIN' FOR IT!!!" Tomo dumped an entire bowl of Miso soup down her throat, much to the shock of any other student around them. Yomi raised an eyebrow as Tomo lowered her bowl, wiping away the liquid with the back of her hand. "C'mon, you gotta be kidding me if you think I'm gonna fall for your tricks!"

Yomi loved Tomo's idiocy.
151131121211.title: The Evident Change

choices: Overeating
Forcefeeding
Other, stranger, methods...
152.content:
Yay! The sporty and busty Kagura!

But how?
152.title: Kagura

choices: Kaori
Kimura's Wife
Mina-chan & Yuka-chan
155.content: There is no more. You probably don't know the last two. I know I sure don't.
155.title: This Is It.  Seriously.

choices: Over eating
Force-feeding
Something else
1551.content: And what causes a lovestruck young woman to put on weight?
1551.title: Kaori

info.brief_description: The girls of Kiyohiko Azuma's smash hit begin  to pack on the pounds!
info.description:
Not much to say, just a few rules;
-Female weight gain only.
-No scatalogical functions, i.e. belching, farting, whatnot.
-Seriously, don't injure the lovely ladies.
-Proper grammar and spelling. I will edit harshly.
-Keep entries over a paragraph or two.
-Watch your language. Chiyo doesn't cuss like a sailor.
-I really don't need to say this, but NO YAOI!

You may, however, do the following;
-Yuri is okay, just keep it decent.
-They can gain exetreme weights, just do it properly!

Besides that, I hope y'all have fun!
